author: marekm3498
content:
For the context:
Nethermind has been very stable on the Pectra devnets for months, but last night, we encountered an issue on Devnet-5.

We identified the root causeâ€”an optimization combined with the BLS precompile. This can be easily disabled for Holesky since it is configurable, but we expect to have a fix for it very soon. Therefore, this should not be considered a blocker for devnet-6 or Holesky.

Regarding fork scheduling, it would be ideal to launch devnet-6 as soon as possible. Once it remains stable for a few days, we can proceed with scheduling Holesky. However, we will also be ready if we decide to release it on Monday for holesky.

Update: It is 100% fixed ðŸ™‚
